au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: ga_20m_20A_test_blocked
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(19250,0) # Drive entrance aperture to 150 (for ga) driveEntRotAp(240)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(300, 0) # Drive attenuator to 240 driveAtt(90)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(300, 0)
